column5: Walking distance to many restaurants and bars in Uptown's popular Knox/Henderson Avenue. Central to anywhere in Uptown, Elm Street, Greenville Ave, and Downtown Dallas. Youâ€™ll enjoy the walkability to all the restaurants, bars, and shops. With its own separate entrance, I'm told the suite has a hotel vibe. The view out the front window is Cochran Park with a tennis court. Cochran Heights is a quiet, quaint, perfectly located neighborhood. Good for solos, couples, and business travelers.
